categories: Category:Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure actors
Category:Ewoks: The Battle for Endor actors

nodes.text: Michael Pritchard voiced the Ewok Chukha-Trok in the made-for-TV film Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure, and portrayed a Sanyassan card player in the film's sequel, Ewoks: The Battle for Endor (1985).
